sense.def: Pathological Condition of xuan 癬 , xuan -illness

a) , with the lesion assuming a round shape like a coin. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry mu jin 木槿 quotes Jing xiao fang 經效方 : 頭面錢癬：槿樹皮為末，醋調， 重湯頓如膠，內傅之 , “ Coin[-size] xuan -illness on the head and face: Grind the bark of jin shu to powder, mix with vinegar, and boil extensively with plenty of water until it turns into a glue. Use this for external application”.
